trigger.title: Trigger: Inventory Changed
trigger.description: Triggers after any changes happen to the player's inventory.

conditions.title: Conditions
conditions.description: Object containing conditions that need to be met when the trigger gets activated. The criterion is marked completed when the trigger activates and all conditions passed.

items.title: Items
items.description: A list of items in the player's inventory. All items in the list must be in the player's inventory, but not all items in the player's inventory have to be in this list.

slots.title: Slots
slots.description: Checks the properties of the player's inventory slots

empty.title: Empty
empty.description: The amount of slots empty in the inventory.

full.title: Full
full.description: The amount of slots completely filled (stack size) in the inventory.

occupied.title: Occupied
occupied.description: The amount of slots occupied in the inventory.
